definition: to make a full confession/to plead guilty

sentences.english: Both boys pleaded guilty to the theft charge and face sentencing at a later date.
sentences.chinese: 这两名男孩对该偷盗指控供认不讳，并将被择日宣判。

sentences.english: The confession was not admitted in court, because the accused claimed it had been extorted.
sentences.chinese: 因为被告声称逼供，故供认未被法庭采信。

sentences.english: They confessed that employed in non-Mount extension tribe.
sentences.chinese: 他们供认，受雇于非芒延族人。

sentences.english: Bianchi had confessed to five of the murders.
sentences.chinese: 比安奇供认了其中五项谋杀。

sentences.english: Her guilty conscience made her confess to her crime.
sentences.chinese: 她的犯罪感使她供认了自己的罪行。

sentences.english: Currently, Lin Moulong facts of their crimes confession.
sentences.chinese: 目前，林某龙对自己的犯罪事实已供认。

sentences.english: Life is not really a fairy tale, you must admit to live with it.
sentences.chinese: 生活并不总是像美丽的童话，你得供认这点。

sentences.english: The chess professor confessed his professioning advishage in the confession.
sentences.chinese: 象棋教授在供状中供认了其职业福气。

sentences.english: MATSUI admits that he heard that foreign governments were protesting against the commission of these atrocities.
sentences.chinese: 松井供认，他知道本国政府对这些暴行的抗议。

sentences.english: Michael Devlin has been sentenced to life in prison after pleading guilty to kidnapping Ben Ownby.
sentences.chinese: 迈克戴夫林在供认绑架本欧文拜后被判处终生监禁。

sentences.english: He also confessed he had committed about 10 similar thefts because of financial problems.
sentences.chinese: 他还供认自己因经济拮据曾犯下约10起类似盗窃案。

sentences.english: The criminal was confined in a prison and soon he confessed his crime.
sentences.chinese: 罪犯被禁闭在监狱，很快他供认了罪行。

sentences.english: By inquest , he fessed that he was the chief instigator of this crime group.
sentences.chinese: 经过审讯，他供认了他是这个犯罪团伙的主谋。

sentences.english: Even if you gave me some gold.
sentences.chinese: 使你给我金子，我也不会供认，”胡兰回答说。

sentences.english: Kong diverts the company large amount fund to it the delinquent account to confess fully.
sentences.chinese: 孔某对其挪用公司巨额资金的犯罪事实供认不讳。

definition: to make a full confession/to plead guilty
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
to make an appearance in court
to commit a crime or offence
